body.text:
{
  "operationName": "addMember",
  "query": "mutation addMember($input: MemberInput!) { addMember(memberInput: $input) { _id memberNumber firstName middleName lastName baptismalName gender startDate endDate email primaryPhone secondaryPhone paymentFlag created_date addresses { street street2 city state zip country created_date } memberFamilies { id firstName middleName lastName baptismalName gender relationShip createdDate } payment{amount,month,year,paymentMethod , paymentDate,createdDate}} }",
  "variables": {
    "input": {
      "memberNumber": "1234544418881",
      "firstName": "UpdatedFirstName",
      "middleName": "UpdatedMiddleName",
      "lastName": "UpdatedLastName",
      "baptismalName": "UpdatedBaptismalName",
      "gender": "Male",
      "startDate": "2024-04-15",
      "endDate": "2024-04-15",
      "email": "updated.email@example.com",
      "primaryPhone": "9876543210",
      "secondaryPhone": "1234567890",
      "paymentFlag": true,
      "payment": {
        "amount": 200,
        "month": "May",
        "year": "2025",
        "paymentMethod": "Debit Card",
        "paymentDate": "2024-05-15",
        "createdDate": "2024-05-15"
      },
      "addresses": [
        {
          "street": "456 Updated St",
          "street2": "Apt 101",
          "city": "Updated City",
          "state": "Updated State",
          "zip": 54321,
          "country": "Updated Country",
          "created_date": "2024-05-15"
        }
      ],
      "memberFamilies": [
        {
          "id": "2",
          "firstName": "Updated Family",
          "middleName": "Updated",
          "lastName": "Member",
          "baptismalName": "",
          "gender": "Male",
          "relationShip": "Relation",
          "createdDate": "2024-05-15"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
